name: 筋肉人
description: 來自激鬥擂台，呈現史上最偉大的運動娛樂秀！觀賞虎面筋肉人、魔鬼筋肉人、雄獅筋肉人、雷霆筋肉人在場內場外的激情碰撞與高空壓頂。請務必記住，瓦羅然摔跤聯盟的品質無與倫比。

wikiSkinData.lore: Probably in a position he'd rather not be in, El Macho will be facing down three of the greatest fighters in modern history for Sunday's no-holds-barred money match. Luckily for him, Mundo has more madness to offer than the federation thinks he's got, and the cream always rises to the top.

skins.name: 雷霆筋肉人 弗力貝爾

wikiSkinData.lore: The Wrestling Federation of Valoran would like to put these terrible rumors about our beloved El Rayo to bed once and for all. One: he is definitely a bear, and not a man dressed as a bear, as some might claim. Two: bears make amazing wrestlers.

He's big. He's small. He's throwing pieces of the ring around like it's made of pixie dust and unicorn whispers. He's El León, the eighth wonder of the world, and he's here to say to his opponents: “Gnar!”

skins.name: 虎面筋肉人 布郎姆

wikiSkinData.lore: A contemporary wrestler beloved the world over, El Tigre's roar is the bellow of a people's champion. He is a friend to all… but can still scissor kick a two hundred pound cage fighter right out of the ring.
